languages.text: "Зря вы так, господин офицер. Теперь придется рапорт на вас писать, а это дело не быстрое. Придется вам со мной еще часок постоять, пока мы его оформим".
"You shouldn't have said that, sir. I'll have to write up a report on you now, and that's no quick job. You'll be stuck here with me for another hour while that's done."
languages.original_text: "Зря вы так, господин офицер. Теперь придется рапорт на вас писать, а это дело не быстрое. Придется вам со мной еще часок постоять, пока мы его оформим".

traits.locale_text: "You shouldn't have said that, sir. I'll have to write up a report on you now, and that's no quick job. You'll be stuck here with me for another hour while that's done."
"You shouldn't have said that, sir. I'll have to write up a report on you now, and that's no quick job. You'll be stuck here with me for another hour while that's done."
"You shouldn't have said that, sir. I'll have to write up a report on you now, and that's no quick job. You'll be stuck here with me for another hour while that's done."
"You shouldn't have said that, sir. I'll have to write up a report on you now, and that's no quick job. You'll be stuck here with me for another hour while that's done."
"You shouldn't have said that, sir. I'll have to write up a report on you now, and that's no quick job. You'll be stuck here with me for another hour while that's done."

languages.text: “这样的话可实在是太不该说了，长官。现在，我恐怕得写一份关于您的报告了，这份报告恐怕得花些时间。看来，您得和我在这里再等上一个小时了。”
languages.original_text: "You shouldn't have said that, sir. I'll have to write up a report on you now, and that's no quick job. You'll be stuck here with me for another hour while that's done."

traits.locale_text: “这样的话可实在是太不该说了，长官。现在，我恐怕得写一份关于您的报告了，这份报告恐怕得花些时间。看来，您得和我在这里再等上一个小时了。”

languages.text: «No debería haber dicho eso, señor. Ahora voy a tener que presentar un informe, y el papeleo no se rellena solo. Tendrá que quedarse aquí conmigo otra hora más mientras lo acabo».
languages.original_text: "You shouldn't have said that, sir. I'll have to write up a report on you now, and that's no quick job. You'll be stuck here with me for another hour while that's done."

traits.locale_text: «No debería haber dicho eso, señor. Ahora voy a tener que presentar un informe, y el papeleo no se rellena solo. Tendrá que quedarse aquí conmigo otra hora más mientras lo acabo».

languages.text: 「今の発言は聞き逃がせませんね。今からじっくりと、あなたの報告書を書かなければなりません。終わるまであと1時間は私と一緒にここにいることになるんですよ？」
languages.original_text: "You shouldn't have said that, sir. I'll have to write up a report on you now, and that's no quick job. You'll be stuck here with me for another hour while that's done."

traits.locale_text: 「今の発言は聞き逃がせませんね。今からじっくりと、あなたの報告書を書かなければなりません。終わるまであと1時間は私と一緒にここにいることになるんですよ？」

languages.text: "Das hättet Ihr nicht sagen sollen, Sir. Jetzt muss ich einen Bericht über Euch schreiben und das dauert. Ihr werdet wohl noch eine Stunde bei mir bleiben müssen, bis ich fertig bin."
languages.original_text: "You shouldn't have said that, sir. I'll have to write up a report on you now, and that's no quick job. You'll be stuck here with me for another hour while that's done."

traits.locale_text: "Das hättet Ihr nicht sagen sollen, Sir. Jetzt muss ich einen Bericht über Euch schreiben und das dauert. Ihr werdet wohl noch eine Stunde bei mir bleiben müssen, bis ich fertig bin."

languages.text: « Vous n'auriez pas dû dire ça, monsieur. Maintenant, je vais devoir rédiger un rapport à votre sujet, et la paperasse prend un temps fou. Vous êtes quitte pour rester ici avec moi encore une bonne heure de plus. »
languages.original_text: "You shouldn't have said that, sir. I'll have to write up a report on you now, and that's no quick job. You'll be stuck here with me for another hour while that's done."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'auriez pas dû dire ça, monsieur. Maintenant, je vais devoir rédiger un rapport à votre sujet, et la paperasse prend un temps fou. Vous êtes quitte pour rester ici avec moi encore une bonne heure de plus. »

languages.text: "İşte bunu söylemeyecektin. Artık seni rapor etmem gerekiyor ve bu çok da hızlı bir süreç değil. Rapor tamamlanana kadar burada benimle bir saat daha mahsur kalacaksın."
languages.original_text: "You shouldn't have said that, sir. I'll have to write up a report on you now, and that's no quick job. You'll be stuck here with me for another hour while that's done."
